column4: How do I change a user's email address from foo@localhost to foo@bar.com ?
I don't mean the OS, I mean the MTA (like postfix or exim)
With postfix, you have to add bar.com to your mydestination line in /etc/postfix/main/cf
really, it is that simple! Edit 1 line and reload.
